div.em: Current conditions as of 24 Apr 09:53 am CDT

div.div: Showers and thunderstorms, mainly after 1pm. High near 75. Southeast wind 5 to 10 mph becoming southwest in the afternoon. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

Showers and thunderstorms before 1am, then a slight chance of showers between 1am and 4am. Low around 52. Southeast wind 5 to 10 mph becoming northwest after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New precipitation amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.
Mostly sunny, with a high near 70. Northwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.
